Reviews.Title: Don't do it
Reviews.Author: 48N116W
Reviews.Content: Do not fall for the 5-star ratings on this thing. I relied on them (the ratings) and I admit I did not closely read the "Product Description" before I made my purchase, but come on! My expectations were not that high considering the price, but this thing is pure junk. The video is fine as long as the cameras and receiver are right next to each other. Any more than a few feet apart (as in three feet), even indoors, the video is so bad that it's useless. Signal interference?? I have no nearby neighbors, and turning off every other wireless device in my home made no difference. Claims of "interference" is their cover for an inferior product. As they say in their own description: "If you need a clear and stable image, do not purchase the wireless video camera". I agree. If you want to completely waste your money on a useless unusable product, by all means buy this one. I give it -5 stars. I wish I had heeded oldcoot's review...

Reviews.Title: BE CAREFUL
Reviews.Author: oldcoot
Reviews.Content: DONT TRUST ALL THESE 5 STAR REVIEWS....INSTALLED CAMERA 60 FT AWAY FROM MONITOR AND IT WOULD NOT PICK UP...MOVED IT CLOSER..WOULD NOT PICK UP...BROUGHT IT IN THE HOUSE...BINGO..IT WORKED...ITS JUST NOT WHY I PURCHASED IT...ALSO IS BLACK AND WHITE ONLY, NO COLOR AT ALL...

Reviews.Title: JUNK!
Reviews.Author: Aren
Reviews.Content: When I received this unit, one camera out of the box did not work. After several emails to the company I just gave up trying to get a replacement or RMA. At one point they even told me to connect it direct to the tv and let them know the result. How exactly do you connect a WIRELESS camera to a tv without the receiver? You can't. These cameras will completely disrupt any WiFi receiver, and are easily disrupted by bluetooth, and cellphones. These units are crap, save your money and by the good ones, or better yet get a wired system. You will be much happier in the long run.

Reviews.Title: Product Review of VideoSecu 2.4 Ghz Wireless Security Camera.
Reviews.Author: Jimmerz48
Reviews.Content: Pretty slick little cameras, about the size of a Medium Tangerine in diameter. By rights there should be 4 units in the box there's room for 2 more on the CCTV-DVR system, and that's my next goal is to purchase 2 more of the cameras only, I took them outside and set them up with power and went back inside and checked them out after dark "they're just fine in the day time" BUT, the IR system is lacking plenty, however, what do you expect for under $100.00, YA'GET WHAT YA PAY FOR, and I've seen systems twice the price with less resolution at night. These go for about 65' then it fades pretty fast, REMEMBER a 9Volt battery will only run one of these for about 15 minutes "at best" so you need the external DC power that's included, ALL IN ALL I'm very happy with what I've got, they'll work just fine for my purposes. I'd recommend them to those who want a inexpensive CCTV-DVR system.

Reviews.Title: I couldn't be more pleased
Reviews.Author: Lisa R. Taylor "Lisa R Taylor, Author"
Reviews.Content: I don't know what the neg reviews are for; these are great cameras. I've got them hooked up outside and I have the receiver inside located in the back bedroom for night watching.  Both cameras are picking up quite well and the night vision is spectacular.  Now I can rest at night knowing all I have to do is wake up and check on my vehicle and front porch.  I intend to get two more cameras for the unit... excellent.

Reviews.Title: this is junk! dont waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Maxatawny Mike
Reviews.Content: I get interference, shadows, and cuts out even 2 feet from receiver. This is junk. I will try Sams club.

Reviews.Title: Wireless Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Donald F. Filsoof
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this,  It's sold by third party and not Amazon.  The unit is not wireless, you have to plug the cameras into a 110 volt outlet, it means you have to rewire the cameras and find outlets to plug the cameras inside the house.  The third party is not responsive to questions nor he/she return telephone calls.  The manual is confusing and very hard to read.  I returned the item and I was not given full refund.  Do not do any business with this outfit, you will be sorry!!!

Reviews.Title: Does what it says it does.
Reviews.Author: David Lieu
Reviews.Content: I bought these from Amazon a couple months ago and they do what they say they do. There is little interface if they cameras are close to the receiver and much more interface when the cameras are far away from the receiver. I would only recommend buying these if you plan to set up the cameras close (10 feet) to the receiver or little blockage between the cameras and the receiver. If you need constant perfect image then I would recommend something else.Two more things I must add:1) When the 2 cameras are installed, you only get 1 camera's image at a time, but they switch back and forth. If you order more cameras, it will be 1 image at time, round-robin style.2) The power cords on these are short (~3 feet). I wanted to install them on the outside of my house, but can't seem to find the right power extender cable online. The ones I found are about 2mm connectors and these are like 1.5mm??

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: jojo
Reviews.Content: This camera uses the 2.Ghz wireless frequency and so can interfere with your 2.4GHz  wireless router, phones etc. It only has four preset channels, so if you have four such cameras it is sure to render your wireless router useless.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Wireless Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Gloria E. Dunston "Gloria"
Reviews.Content: No issues with delivery.  Very good personal security system.  With the wave of crime that has come about as the result of the economy, this was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Native Pheonix
Reviews.Content: The only thing from stopping me from sending this junk back is that I waited too long. I've had two different good geeks try and hook this junk up and ... nothing.Maybe it's worth something as scrap metal.

Reviews.Title: poor company poor product
Reviews.Author: jaynebarnes
Reviews.Content: These people rip their customers off with both poor product and poor customer service .  The product does not deserve any stars and when I returned it I was not given my money back .  A restocking fee was charged and then they said it was scratched badly.  It never left the box.  When I realized i had to purchase a recorder and there was no slot for a sd card .  Not what i needed anyway.  Very cheap looking I immediately asked to return it.It took forever to hear from them  after I shipped it .  Amazon as a whole is a great company but be ware of some third parties as some are great and some very bad.  This is the worst!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: So So
Reviews.Author: Double_D
Reviews.Content: This item is an okay deal for the money. However, if you want some real security then dont opt for this one. Spend a little more. This one has lots of interference and very short range. the cameras work great besides the interference.

Reviews.Title: Don't trust it.
Reviews.Author: none
Reviews.Content: Managed to bust the video stream in under 5 minutes with just a few simple tools, so I wouldn't count on this if you want security....

Reviews.Title: Wireless security system
Reviews.Author: mercedez rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Very good system, I have no problems with interferences with having any other wireless devices being on.  Clear picture, great audio easy very easy installation.

Reviews.Title: lousy
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Lamport
Reviews.Content: doesn't work like we expected, piece of junk, should have saved my money, needed it before, have no use for it now

Reviews.Title: Terrible!!! Nothing but problems w/unit and seller
Reviews.Author: dkid
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera system hoping it would be an inexpensive way to monitor backyard and cars. I didn't get to it right away, probly 2 weeks to install and nothing but problems. Picture rolls constantly, picture so snowy can't make out anything and lots of feed back. I moved the cameras many times, no improvement. Tried different TV monitors, no improvement. tried different cables,and moved DVR away from anything that would cause EMI (electro magnetic interference), nothing would improve the picture quality.  I contacted the seller and they wouldn't do anything to resolve the problem. Pretty much it was my baby. NO REFUND and if I wanted them to fix it I would have to pay and for the shipping as well. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!  If you are looking at this unit all I can say is good luck! I aways read the reviews and knew I was taking a chance with this system, but figured if I had a problem the seller would stand behind their product, not so. And what ever you do if you buy this hook it up right away,because if you have a problem after that you are on your own.VERY POOR QUALITY, don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Very effective product
Reviews.Author: Frank A. Rossetti
Reviews.Content: I bought these cameras and they arrived in two days from Texas and I live in New Jersey. So I as you may have guessed I have no complaints as far as shipping and handling. Everything comes neatly in a small cardboard box everything is individually wrapped to prevent damage and keep everything in order.Package Includes:Instruction Manual (Easy to read)Two packs of screws and other plastic mountsTwo black bullet type cameras with several effective IR lightsOne receiver with 4 channels for four different cameras (Assuming you might buy more)-The receiver has switches so you can turn certain cameras on and off along with a button to change viewsThree power cable (One for the receiver and two for the cameras-They are NOT very long)One Audio Video to Audio Video cable to connect your receiver to a TVNO DIFFICULT SOFTWARE TO WORRY ABOUTTwo 24 Hour Surveillance stickersNO cables to connect this to a computer or monitor (ONLY TV)The colors and brilliant and the field of view is quite large despite their very tiny size. Night vision is just as clear up to 25-30 feet longer and you'll need another light source. Do not listen to these people complaining about connection problems and receiver issues there are hardly any. Everything I encountered was an easy fix. Both my cameras are on different ends of my roof in the front. My receiver is in the front most bedroom. The picture is clear and static free. No complaints with this package thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Cpl Steve Williams
Reviews.Content: Got them installed by my front dor facinfg my cars and front my wife is disabled and it helps a lot . Not sure what the negative comments are about mine work great even with the nine volt batteries.also would like to add that person said the cameras were poor and only showed blackand white.  I beg to differ.  Just come tokyo house I will show you vivid color. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Range isn't even close!
Reviews.Author: Jon Conley "Jon Conley"
Reviews.Content: The range isn't nearly what the seller says it is. We tried this at a reasonable range compared to what the seller said. It was in a wide open area with no obstructions and it didn't even come close. Sturdy housing but lousy signal strength.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras for the Money
Reviews.Author: Ronald
Reviews.Content: I bought this system  last month.The system works fine I also bought a DVR recorder to.The system is in color and it pans back in forth to my flat screen TV.There is no glich, It has night viewing it has led lights.You can still make out images at night within 50 feet.It not a bad system for the money.Get a long cords about 10 feet for each cameraA battery will not last long.

Reviews.Title: Didn't meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Princess King
Reviews.Content: This product clearly doesn't do what I needed it to.  Not good quality nor good reception.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Analog and tricky to set up, but it does work well for the price I got it for.
Reviews.Author: jetpackjones
Reviews.Content: I did not read the description well when I purchased this unit.  This unit also did not have a lot of ratings to read when I purchased it but I really did not expect to have the problems I had with it.this device is ANALOG WIRELESS, meaning that although it sees in the dark and in light, the video is grainy like old school CCTV systems.  you would be hard pressed to identify a criminal through these lenses, and they are very obviously cameras when you spot them.These are more of a scare tactic than they are a decent evidence and surveilance system.  There are no Mics, the ranges are laughable and the fact that modern wifi and wireless telephone systems interfere with the signals they utilize, these are more fit to be set up in a car wash than in a home or business setting that would have other technology that could interfere with them.

Reviews.Title: This is junk
Reviews.Author: not happy
Reviews.Content: This is a lousy system. The camera's have to be within 2 feet of the receiver or the picture quailty is hard to see and snowy. do not but this it's not worth it. If the price is to good to be true, it is.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: I mounted the cameras on portable platforms and am able to move anywhere in the house or to view out any window with great clarity (interferes a little with my wireless network if in the same room as router but not a big deal). Great product.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Loveoldtv
Reviews.Content: I ordered this the cameras didn't work at all and I returned it and didn't even get a full refund I don't recommend this at all.

Reviews.Title: Product just
Reviews.Author: Otto C G "IT"
Reviews.Content: Easy to install and configure, good quality materials, rather complicated to set-upUnfortunately the indications for sale are not entirely clear

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Brenda Dials
Reviews.Content: got these cameras and cant get them setup and working right. I've tried winXP, vista and a TV.  I can only get one camera to work. I cant find any online support. Really fed up with these cams.this is the setting I'm using to get one to work.up to date winXP computer or vista laptopeasycap d60 or v-stream internal capture cardadobe flash live encoder

Reviews.Title: good camera system
Reviews.Author: Joseph J. Petrucelli
Reviews.Content: these cameras work good , great value for the cost , I recieved them quickly , images are clear and crisp , thanks for a great product

Reviews.Title: 2 in - 2 ft - 20 ft ... still does not work ... so disappointed
Reviews.Author: charlie40403
Reviews.Content: No matter the distance...No matter the angle...No matter the power supply...NOTHIN' HONEY! Tried multiple locations & angles, too. Still NOTHIN' HONEY! The two Security Camera Systems I got at Harbor Freight for about $40 ea work far more superiorly than these.  In this case...I read the reviews AFTER I had already purchased these.  My Bad! Won't buy this line of security system or components again.

Reviews.Title: The shipping Charges!!!!
Reviews.Author: Thomas M Beasley
Reviews.Content: Expected to pay the charges for the shipping to me. Was very surprised when charged for the return after (RMD)I PAID for thereturn charges by UPS!! Although it was only Twelve Dollars and change , I STILL PAID FOR IT!!! Don't understand why I was charged!!!For that reason I have purchased items from other retailers that don't  charge when I pay for return. YOUR LOSS, NOT MINE!Have been and will  be very careful about RMD return charges! When available elsewhere than AMAZON will purchase there!Tom BI'm not going to give reviews on the other items.

Reviews.Title: Something I can handle
Reviews.Author: Studious investor
Reviews.Content: I understand how to work a vcr and was able to set this device up immediately. The camera and the microphone work perfectly and I can record both video and audio onto a video tape. I also bought a fancy dvr set up from another vendor, which will enable me to record and view remotely, but really all I needed was a device to document the noise from our neighbors property as it invaded our own property.  The video was not as important to me as it only shows where the microphone is located and I am placing a clock with a date and time to show when the sound is being recorded and from where. If you don't need remote access and if the video is secondary, then this item is perfect.

Reviews.Title: I can;t use it.
Reviews.Author: Richard Bovelle
Reviews.Content: Probably a great system, but when I plug it in, it kills my wifi. Anybody got any suggestions? I really want to use it!

Reviews.Title: These have been working for months without a problem
Reviews.Author: Tom Craig
Reviews.Content: Work great, but could be a little bit better. But then again I could have spent more money, so for what I spent I am very happy with this product and plan on buying additional cameras soon.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Some interferences.It is possible to improve positioning near the receiver.Easy to install, very good night shot.I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not good for outside security.
Reviews.Author: BOBD
Reviews.Content: This unit will work fine for monitoring your children.(baby sitter) The unit needs to be next to each other for a clear picture (within inches) I returned the this unit because it didn't work for my needs (monitoring my yard). If you are concern about security for your home or business my recommendation is not to purchase a wireless unit.

Reviews.Title: Interferences during use
Reviews.Author: Aristides Martinez
Reviews.Content: The wirelees security cameras have to many interferences with its signal once they are placed outdoor, indoors they work good, in case you have any suggesstion of how to get less inteference , plesase inform.

Reviews.Title: The product does not meat my standards.
Reviews.Author: Spark
Reviews.Content: It does not send the signal clearly. When i have it close to any other wireless device has tons of static. I cannot record with this it is simply for monitoring purposes only. Was not satisfied with the end result.

Reviews.Title: good cameras for a decent price
Reviews.Author: pugz
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great. The signal between the camera and the receiver isn't very strong. I ordered a second receiver to address this issue and now I don't have any problems with reception. The night vision in the house was great but is not as good outside. We have 2 set up near motion detector lights, so it isn't too much of a problem.  They do not like my microwave, however. (The microwave is between the cameras and the receiver) Not a big, big problem since we only use it when we're home...

Reviews.Title: IBFU
Reviews.Author: Eli Simmons
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY when you plug it in it stopped your internet routers signals ! Do not buy unless you don't have internet !!!

Reviews.Title: love it and tested home left it running but still using plasma tv and working well
Reviews.Author: Simao Muanda
Reviews.Content: the product works well ecelent and tested and left it running both comera and out door with good visibility on image collor  and tested with durk time and working well and filming with no dificult.

Reviews.Title: Range blows
Reviews.Author: TreeHugger..Not
Reviews.Content: The picture was terrible and range was very short. It would be good in your house if you have to monitor something like a dog and you are in another room but forget having it travel more than 100 feet.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Hella Bell
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu2.4gHzRadius is too small and night time pictures are "ghostly" and unclear. The cables are much too short, especially, if the receiver is to be moved away from tv, etc to get a better picture.

Reviews.Title: Junk.  Good email response
Reviews.Author: Bender ""I could've been the walrus""
Reviews.Content: Colors were off , I mean green was pink.  No recording software.Small, so that makes it convenient.Get  the larger bullet with better ir, this one, I'm not sure it ever saw anything at night.They lie, this set was getting interference, the replacement was these two for one, that wouldn't have interference.  Guess what came?  Same camera.Enjoy your 18 feet of viewing.Best use, put above door to see who's there. That and it fills a trash can well too thats what  did after I was tired of trying to explain everything.

Reviews.Title: Home Security System
Reviews.Author: Dickmo "RRCraig"
Reviews.Content: I ordereed to silver cameras first and not to happy with one of the them but the two black one I ordered are very good.  They are clear and keep good reception.  I'm well satisfied and I'm going to reorder two more to replace the orther ones.

Reviews.Title: no reception
Reviews.Author: Betty J. Wood
Reviews.Content: never buy wireless. It will not reach anywhere. does not hook up to my tv. I do not like it at all.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: pedro
Reviews.Content: is fabulous i like it so much is a great deal for me thank you so much, i love it

Reviews.Title: Not very good product.
Reviews.Author: Osvaldo Vargas
Reviews.Content: I received this item overseas, so it's very expensive for me to return it. Product looked ok out of the box, but one of the cameras never worked. It says 100 ft wireless transmition, I'm getting static at 20 ft, strait line, no obstacles in the middle. Taking a closer look at the receiver box it looks cheap. I bought this for my wife's office but with the problems it has, it's a no go for me.Well I guess u get what u pay for...

Reviews.Title: good service
Reviews.Author: Joseph orr
Reviews.Content: a friend and family becasue they will work and they will protect us from gettin broken into by theifs. and druggies

Reviews.Title: Internet capability?
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I just received these cameras yesterday and am still trying to figure them out.  The instructions are minimal.Is there any way I can transmit these cameras over the internet so I can check on my home while I am at work?If so, how can I do this?  Any replies will be greatly appreciated.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: decent system, easy set up
Reviews.Author: jbella
Reviews.Content: This system was easy to set up and the picture quality is very good, even at night.  There is interference on one of the cameras from time to time but the second camera projects a very clear picture. Both are positioned outside.  You do have to plug in your cameras to an electrical source (although a battery can be used and the hook up was included).  The wireless receiver works well if cameras are positioned anywhere in the house but if the cameras are outside you have to adjust their location in order to get a clear picture depending on walls, distance, etc.  We purchased this as a gift for monitoring wildlife.  This system works well for what we intended and the recipient is enjoying this.  We are using a portable tv as monitor.

Reviews.Title: Home Surveillance System
Reviews.Author: mztea
Reviews.Content: For under $100.00 this little security camera works great and the color is excellent with impressive sound quality for such a tiny microphone.  It very reassuring  and gives peace of mind to be aware of what is going on outside without having to leave the comfort of my home.  It is so much easier to pop up and hit a button.  All in all, it was money well spent.  The package arrived on time in great condition and well packaged.  I would definitely buy from Warehouseseller at Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: EXECENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: SIR McMILLON
Reviews.Content: WORKS AWSOME FOR THE PRICE; I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO ANYONE STAYING IN A BUDGET AND RECIEVE A REALQUALITY HOME SURVEILLANCE SYSTEM.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: mrmrmesa "Mrmrmesa"
Reviews.Content: This product was great . I would recommend to anyone anytime.Thanks youThis product was great . I would recommend to anyone anytime.Thanks you

Reviews.Title: make sure you know what getting
Reviews.Author: craigf1
Reviews.Content: This product works good the only thing I didnt realize is that I had to purchase a dvr recorder to be able to save all the video , I thought that it came with it in the receiver but it did not, maybe its my fault that I didnt read it closely enough but just be aware, over all Im happy with the system,

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: rafal_poland
Reviews.Content: Range - 10m, one wall - out of range2.4Ghz interference with WIFI! Or Interenet a router or image from the camera!I DO NOT RECOMMEND!

ProductInfo.Features:
380 TV line video resolution. Wireless frequency: 2.4 GHz
Affordable wireless surveillance solution
Easily installation, plug and play just connect receiver to your TV or VCR
Up to 100 ft wireless transmission and up to 26 ft night vision
Package contents: 2 x IR CMOS Camera with built in transmitter, 1 x Wireless Receiver, 3 x Power Supplies (2 for Camera, 1 for Receiver), 1 RCA Jack Video/Audio Cable
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2.4 GHz Wireless Security Camera Set Night Vision with Audio Microphone for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System WAH
